Class InternshipController

java.lang.Object
InternshipController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InternshipServiceInterface
public class InternshipController extends Object implements InternshipServiceInterface
Implementation of internship management services.

This class implements the InternshipServiceInterface, providing internship opportunity management with loose coupling.

Version:
1.0

    • getFilteredOpportunities

      public List<InternshipOpportunity> getFilteredOpportunities(Student student)
      Description copied from interface: InternshipServiceInterface
      Gets filtered internships for a specific student.

      Applies all business rules: visibility, approval status, dates, level eligibility, preferred major matching, not filled.

      Specified by:
      getFilteredOpportunities in interface InternshipServiceInterface
      Parameters:
      student - the student to filter for
      Returns:
      list of eligible internships for the student
